name.en: Only the 'en' key is required for the name.
name.jp: If the following are not applicable
name.kr: it's safe to leave it out.

platform_id: yt = youtube channel, bb = bilibili, tt = twitchtv
channel_id: UNIQUE. Channel identifier. Youtube has a 24 long string, Bilibili has numbers, Twitch uses usernames.

details.twitter: Not required, but would be nice to be included in the defaults if you want to submit a pull request.
details.key1: Any key-value pair here is dynamic, so if you want to save custom
details.key2: static data put it here. No logic is done here.
details.key3: If you want to submit a pull request please keep the keys as
